i_am: I am Matthew Stead, founder and owner of Steed Woodworking.
wood_passion: Woodworking has been a passion of mine ever since I was young. I spend most of my free time in the shop, and every moment is dedicated to the beautiful art of woodworking.
variety: I create a variety of wooden items, from chairs to chests, lamps and canlde holders. Most of my work is limited to the tools I have at the time, but as this project grows there will only be a greater range of tools and therefore works to be sold.
